text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, September 22, 1830. Much biographical matter. Conditions in Texas. Land matters.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-22-1830">Sept 22 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I have just got your letter of *date_mentioned n="07-18-1830">July 18*/date_mentioned* and am truly glad that you had so quick a trip *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*and found all well with the addition of another *person_mentioned*son*/person_mentioned*— I was surprised that you thought me silent and reserved—it was what I never dreamed of-— I told you the *location_mentioned*grant */location_mentioned*was in *person_mentioned*your and Emilys name jointly*/person_mentioned*— however I hope it is enough for me to say that if I appear reserved exteriourly I was not so in heart, and I will here apprise you and *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*of a change which time care and something like disgust towards the *location_mentioned*world */location_mentioned*and human affairs, has wrought upon my disposition I find from your letter that I ought to have done it the first day we met—- I have for the last few years been gradually loosing my taste for society, or for conversation— I am getting tactiturn, or what may be called absent minded— Silence is more agreeable to me than talking or noise— this thing is becoming habitual and in spite of myself it is growing upon me very rapidly— I therefore apprise you both that if you move here, you must not expect to find me the cheerful companion I once was,— if you wish to know any thing from me, you must ask the question direct, if I answer, yes, or no, and say no more, which may often be the case, you must not think that it proceeds from coolness on my part*/p*
*p*I expect *person_mentioned*Henry Austin*/person_mentioned* here *date_mentioned n="09-23-1830">tomorrow*/date_mentioned*, he has arrived in the *location_mentioned*Brasos */location_mentioned*with his boat, and on the first interview with him I shall tell him of this part of my habits so that he may not be misled as you were, and think I am cool because I am not a great talker; dismiss that impression from your mind for ever I pray you I told you the *location_mentioned*grant */location_mentioned*was in *person_mentioned*your and Emilys name jointly*/person_mentioned* — that was in fact saying all that could have been said on the subject by a days talking, and so far from casting any reflection on you as to *person_mentioned*Bryans children*/person_mentioned* I felt gratefull for the care you had taken of them and was truly gratified that it was in my power to aid you in providing for them by means of this *location_mentioned*grant*/location_mentioned*, and besides this it was necessary to state in the petition for the land that there were two *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*to be provided for in order to give a sufficient reason for asking for such a quantity as *location_mentioned*Eleven Leagues*/location_mentioned*, without this it would not have been granted—. I hope this is sufficient on this point and that your mind will be at rest and never again think that I am silent or cool towards you for I again assure you there is nothing of that, in my heart, nothing—*/p*
*p*I am as I was when you were here litterally overwhelmed with perplexities worse if possible than when you left I have no prospect of much quiet for the future, nor of being able to enjoy much of your society even if you move, at least for two years, for I was elected on the *date_mentioned n="09-05-1830">5 of this month*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*a member of the Legislature of this State*/person_mentioned* for the *date_mentioned n="01-01-1831 - 01-01-1833">two years from the 1 of Jany next*/date_mentioned* and must leave here in *date_mentioned n="12-xx-1830">Decr */date_mentioned*for *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*where I shall probably be detaind one year and perhaps longer—*date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1821"> nine years ago*/date_mentioned* I inlisted my self as the *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*, and there is no remedy now, for I am bound in honor and duty to labor for it untill its affairs are finally done Our affairs with Govt, are on a much better footing than when you left here and are getting better—tho on that point changes are frequent. Now as to your removal—I have no *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*up nor under way—I made an arrangement with *person_mentioned*Morton */person_mentioned*to build one he was taken sick and disappointed me— The *location_mentioned*Steam Mill*/location_mentioned* did not get under way as soon as was expected and has broken several times and done but little— I am now contracting with a *person_mentioned*carpenter */person_mentioned*to put up a *location_mentioned*frame store*/location_mentioned* in this place and will try and have it ready by the time *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*arrives—*/p*
*p*From what you say I do not expect the *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*untill *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1831">next fall—*/date_mentioned* It will be hazarding too much to come in the *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1831">Spring */date_mentioned*and besides perhaps you can come on during the *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1831">spring */date_mentioned*or *date_mentioned n="Summer - 1831">summer */date_mentioned*yourself and have a place provided for them to suit yourself—*/p*
*p*There is much difficulty with *person_mentioned*Edwards */person_mentioned*about the *location_mentioned*place at the point*/location_mentioned* and I know not as yet how to settle it without much bad feeling of an unpleasant nature, and your delay in removing will make the thing much worse— that *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*is of no value except as a pleasant situation— land of more value can be had— I will do the best I can— The titles are not yet finished because *person_mentioned*Padilla */person_mentioned*still is in confinement and no new *person_mentioned*Commissioner */person_mentioned*has been appointed— I now say to you once for all that any place which I have you may have for a residence or farm or what you please—the place where I originally intended to settle all my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*is at *location_mentioned*peach point*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*below Brasoria, on the Sea Shore prairie at the edge of the timber 6 miles from the sea beach—*/location_mentioned* Every body says it is the best land and the best situation in the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*— It is my first choice for a *location_mentioned*residence*/location_mentioned*, and on *location_mentioned*Chocolate Bayou*/location_mentioned* is my second choice— I need you here to take care of my pecuniary affairs— unless I have some one to manage them for me I shall be as poor as a church mouse as long as I live, but you must consult your own feelings and your own wishes and act for yourself. If you come here, all that I can do shall be done. I am expecting instructions as to the introduction of *person_mentioned*negros*/person_mentioned*, and as I have now no hope of seeing you *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1830">this fall*/date_mentioned* there will be time enough to send them to you before I leave here for *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*My confidence in the ultimate rise and prosperity of this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* is in no degree impared, it must prosper in the end— I have recd by the last mail the most friendly and satisfactory letters from *person_mentioned*Mr. Lucas Alamán the minister of state*/person_mentioned*, and from the *person_mentioned*vice President Bustamante*/person_mentioned*, and from *person_mentioned*Genl. Teran*/person_mentioned*, they all say to me that this *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*will be fully protected and encouraged by the Govt, and their confidence in me and in this *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*is full and unimpaired and that they always have had confidence in me and the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*etc. these assurances are very flattering, and I think them sincere— My election to the *location_mentioned*legislature */location_mentioned*will also place me on still higher ground, tho I think it very probable that some change may take place as to our *person_mentioned*local government*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*does not suit to be united with *location_mentioned*Coahuila*/location_mentioned*— But I am running into the all absorbing subject of public affairs, and general interests a thing which has always occupied so much of my time that I have neglected my own private affairs in toto, and I fear will always neglect them unless you are here to manage them. I had determind to put all my affairs of a private nature into your hands— I am laboring more for *person_mentioned*yours and Emilys children*/person_mentioned* than for myself—what do I want with property or fortune? but little will do me, and every year less, for I am dayly getting more tired of the *location_mentioned*world */location_mentioned*and its entercourse and affairs— however let no wish of mine influence you, do as you please—only never again think that I am silent or reserved because I am not a great talker*/p*
*p*I know not what else to say— I am opposed to your removing in the *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1831">spring*/date_mentioned*, tho if you put the *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*at *location_mentioned*Peach point*/location_mentioned* I believe they will be [as] healthy as at any other place in the *location_mentioned*wood */location_mentioned*so do as you please on that subject— I shall be absent from here but that will make no difference I shall leave a full power of attorney with *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*to deliver to you all notes due to me, as soon as you arrive so that you may collect them in stock and also take charge of all my affairs I shall also leave my will with him to be delivered to you—*/p*
*p*If you come *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1830">this fall*/date_mentioned* you must be content to quarter in *location_mentioned*log cabbins*/location_mentioned*, which you will have to put up after you get here but that is no great job and I could do it, but I prefer that you would look at *location_mentioned*Peach point*/location_mentioned* and other places and chuse for yourself— If you want any thing let me know, and not think I am reserved because I do not offer it— I again tell you and *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*that I am far different in my habits of cheerfulness and loquacity from what I once was— remember this and run no more into an error that is calculated to mar the happiness of us all— I hope next mail to get an answer from the Govt, as to the appointment of a *person_mentioned*commissioner */person_mentioned*and will finish the letter but I do not know how I shall manage the thing with *person_mentioned*Edwards*/person_mentioned* and you must not be disappointed if that place is not included. I mean the situation at the *location_mentioned*point on the Bay*/location_mentioned*— write me as to this and whether not getting that *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*will make any material difference with you— The situation *location_mentioned*on the Bay between the point and clear creek*/location_mentioned* is as good as that*location_mentioned* at the point*/location_mentioned* in some respects— Let me know your wishes and as you justly observe be very frank with me—*/p*
*p*I am sorry to say that some of the people here are in a tangle amongst themselves. *person_mentioned*Seth Ingram*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned* are in confinement for killing a man by the name of *person_mentioned*Holtham*/person_mentioned*—it happened in an affray in the street—public opinion is very much excited against *person_mentioned*League */person_mentioned*It all happend, as most of such things do in my absence the *date_mentioned n="09-xx-1830">beginning of this month*/date_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*—- The fate of *person_mentioned*League */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Seth Ingram (the surveyor)*/person_mentioned* is very doubtful, particularly the former— There is a furious excitement all over the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*against him— I think that you cannot complain that this letter is short so I will close it —-*/p*
*p*remember me to the *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-26-1830">26th */date_mentioned* I am perplexed about your removal, I have not yet seen*person_mentioned* H. Austin*/person_mentioned*. I really want you here to take care of my pecuniary affairs, and have some idea of throwing the whole of them into *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned*s hands*/p*
*p*There is no remidy for me, I must continue to devote all my time to the general interests of the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*or it will not advance, it may be necessary for me to go to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1831">next year*/date_mentioned*— I cannot request you to advise any of my *person_mentioned*relations */person_mentioned*to come here— They would all think as you have that I am silent reserved cold or some thing else—¦ better live apart than in that way so for the future I never will say one word about any person who is in any degree related to me, removing to this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*. If you were here to attend to it there might be two hundred cows and calves collected for me this *date_mentioned n="Winter - 1830">winter */date_mentioned*and *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1831">spring */date_mentioned*and as many more in the *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1831">fall*/date_mentioned*— this would be a sufficient start for a stock farm— I wish to know definitely what you intend to do for I must make some final arrangement before long, I have an impression that I told you all this when you were here, but perhaps I only thought it— At all events let me know what you are going to do and when you will be here, but act for yourself and do not be influenced by me in any part of your movement, I only want to know what to depend upon and what arrangements I must make to try and get some one to take charge of my affairs while I am absent and occupied about other matters */p* *p* *person_mentioned*S. F. A*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sam Browne*/person_mentioned* is well*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-27-1830">27th.*/date_mentioned* I send you a power of attorney which you must sign at both the places marked with pencil thus—*/p*
*p*It is appointing *person_mentioned*S. M. Williams*/person_mentioned* your and your *person_mentioned*wife*/person_mentioned*s *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*to attend to getting your titles completed—send this back by some safe conveyance as soon as you can. it ought to have been signed when you were here and is dated then. Be sure and sign it at both places *person_mentioned*Emily*/person_mentioned* need not sign it—*/p*
*p*[Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
